long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UPV is an extension that improves the functionality of U-Portfolio.

The current version of UPV features automatic session extension and removal of unnecessary and unreasonable keyboard and mouse restrictions.

Future versions will implement on-exit-warning, better auto-save feature, and improvements to the UI.

Please note that this program and its developer are in no way affiliated with U-Portfolio and CETALAB.

*UPV is open source and can be found at https://github.com/ACK72/UPV
